data.title: Warren Armstrong Haggott, letter, 1908-07-28, to Hamlin Garland
data.meta_description: Warren Armstrong Haggott, U.S. House of Representatives, Washington, DC, USA, letter, 1908 July 28, to "editor" [Hamlin Garland] (Shadow World, Everybody's Magazine), New York, New York, USA. "Mrs. Emma Peck has written an account of some very extraordinary occurrences which took place in the home of her parents when she was a child." -- first line.
